title: #107: Money and Fear with Pye Ian
description:
Welcome to the another deep dive on the Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli podcast. This episode Sam and Ryan welcome from the Money and Fear podcast on Newbuds.com, Pye Ian. We discuss Fractional Reserve Banking and the Petrodollar.
PS: We are playing the Legion of Skanks song because we have been invited to Skankfest. Please forward all complaints to Off The Grid Ryan.
itunes:author: Sam Tripoli
